comment: @GreatGameIndia So? This is stupid. She has nothing to do with that. Surely some of your indian ancestors helped the brits in India in some way, shape or form. Does that define you? What a grandparent did does not tarnish who someone is. Doing futile reporting reflects badly on you, not on her.
